sentences.en: A sliver of light showed under the door.
At the doffer, fibers are removed and eventually enter the card sliver.
sentences.cn: 纤维被从落纱机上剥下,形成梳棉棉条输出.

sentences.en: Cut me just a small sliver of cheese.
Eight slivers are drawn together to produce the drawn sliver.
sentences.cn: 在末道并条机上,八根棉条并合在一起被牵伸成熟条.

sentences.en: Every cloud has a sliver lining.
In the space of all possible lifes, life on Earth is but a tiny sliver -- one attempt at creativity.
sentences.cn: 在所有可能有生命存在的空间里，地球上孕育的生命只占那么一小条――创造性的一次努力。

sentences.en: Productive efficiency and quality of card sliver & yarn are enhanced.
sentences.cn: 提高了生产效率和生条 与 成纱质量.

sentences.en: Pwlationship between the production and deliver speed and sliver count.
sentences.cn: 棉条定量--出条速度--产量的关系.

sentences.en: She was wearing a sliver fox fur across her shoulders.
sentences.cn: 她肩上披了一件银色的狐皮衣.

sentences.en: She wore a small sliver crucifix on a chain round her neck.
sentences.cn: 她脖子上戴着项链,上面挂着银的十字架.

sentences.en: Sliver Silver carp can also jump high and hit boatsboaters.
sentences.cn: 鲢鱼还能跳得很高伤及船员.

sentences.en: Still the sliver lay on the table, next to the teabags.
sentences.cn: 任凭这张碎片静静地躺在茶袋旁.

sentences.en: The night of our birth, a thunderstorm had cracked a tree in the courtyard of the new church, setting the building afire until it was no more than a charred sliver of steeple and smoking pews.
sentences.cn: 我们出生的那个晚上，雷暴劈倒了新教堂大院里的一棵树，整个建筑着了火，最后只剩下了烧焦了的尖塔裂片和冒着烟的教堂板凳。

sentences.en: The sliver must therefore be attenuated.
There was only one sliver of light in the darkness.
sentences.cn: 黑暗中只有一点零星的光亮。

sentences.en: Used for testing the evenness of sliver and roving.
sentences.cn: 用于检验条子及粗纱的条干均匀度.

sentences.en: We had a party to celebrate Mother's sliver wedding.
sentences.cn: 我们举行了晚会庆祝母亲的银婚纪念.

trans.tran_cn: 条子，梳条，细片，长条，裂片，（作鱼饵用的）小鱼片
trans.tran_en: a small pointed or thin piece that has been cut or broken off something
